verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: had] spent five days at a military hospital for a kidney condition the White House described as benign .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] had [V: spent] [ARG1: five days] [ARGM-LOC: at a military hospital] [ARG2: for a kidney condition the White House described as benign] .
Melania Trump had spent five days at a military hospital for [ARG1: a kidney condition] [ARG0: the White House] [V: described] [ARG2: as benign] .
